model.hand.representation

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.hand.representation.Hand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HoldEmHand, OmahaHand, PineappleHand

    public abstract class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
implements HandInterface
    The abstract class implements HandInterface, the class describes a generic poker hand, one full turn in a poker game.

    The class deals the community cards and allows for the players to make bets. The hand object runs through a full poker hand, and decides its winner.

    Since:
    9/26/2016
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Emmet Murray
